text:
My question is how to set the java options such as "-g" in the build.xml file so
ant calls javac with those options.  I wasn't successful in finding these in the
online documentation (using <ctrl-f> on "java opt", "compiler opt", etc).

Thanx!

--alexx
creator: stehmana@cadmus.com

text:
This is in the manual for the <javac> task.  Use the debug and debuglevel 
attributes.  Also, this would be more a question for the userlist at 
user@ant.apache.org than an entry in the bug database.

-Matt
creator: mbenson@apache.org
